alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 2:56AM CST until November 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Highest snowfall amounts over northern Price County. * WHERE...Price County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
